org.apache.ignite.springdata.repository.support

Class IgniteRepositoryImpl<T,ID extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.springdata.repository.support.IgniteRepositoryImpl<T,ID>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IgniteRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,ID>

    public class IgniteRepositoryImpl<T,ID extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements IgniteRepository<T,ID>
    General Apache Ignite repository implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public <S extends T> S save(ID key,
                            S entity)
        Saves a given entity using provided key.

        It's suggested to use this method instead of default CrudRepository.save(Object) that generates IDs (keys) that are not unique cluster wide.
        Specified by:
        save in interface IgniteRepository<T,ID extends Serializable>
        Type Parameters:
        S - Entity type.
        Parameters:
        key - Entity's key.
        entity - Entity to save.
        Returns:
        Saved entity.

      • save

        public <S extends T> Iterable<S> save(Map<ID,S> entities)
        Saves all given keys and entities combinations.

        It's suggested to use this method instead of default CrudRepository#save(Iterable) that generates IDs (keys) that are not unique cluster wide.
        Specified by:
        save in interface IgniteRepository<T,ID extends Serializable>
        Type Parameters:
        S - type of entities.
        Parameters:
        entities - Map of key-entities pairs to save.
        Returns:
        Saved entities.
